p: The authors concluded that the synthesized compound A-87380 might serve as a valid lead and set out to optimize the structure to discover clinically effective oral neuraminidase inhibitors. The tri- and tetrasubstituted pyrrolidine moiety-containing derivatives were obtained using combinatorial chemistry techniques, particularly high-throughput parallel synthesis, leading to the discovery of A-192558 ( Table 1, Compound 2). Both of the presented compounds contained a Î²-amino acid moiety.
